20110118140313.000|20110118140315.000|CC1|WAS EVEN THOUGH THE CALL CAME

20110118140317.000|20110118140320.000|CC1|AT TOPANGA AND ROSCOE, THEY ARE 
20110118140320.000|20110118140321.000|CC1|SAYING THIS WAS AN ATTEMPTED

20110118140325.000|20110118140326.000|CC1|GOT THE CALL AND OFFICERS       
20110118140326.000|20110118140327.000|CC1|RESPONDED AND WERE CHASING A    
20110118140327.000|20110118140329.000|CC1|MAN THAT MATCHED THE            
20110118140329.000|20110118140332.000|CC1|DESCRIPTION OF THE SUSPECT.

20110118140335.000|20110118140339.000|CC1|THAT'S WHEN THEY OPENED FIRE,   
20110118140339.000|20110118140340.000|CC1|KILLING THE SUSPECT.            
20110118140340.000|20110118140341.000|CC1|ONE SUSPECT IS DEAD,            
20110118140341.000|20110118140343.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS ARE ON THE SCENE  
20110118140343.000|20110118140344.000|CC1|DOCUMENTING WHAT HAPPENED.

20110118140521.000|20110118140522.000|CC1|UNCLE, MIGUEL TEJAH, TRIED TO   
20110118140522.000|20110118140524.000|CC1|LIGHT A BARBECUE GRILL NEAR THE 
20110118140524.000|20110118140525.000|CC1|BABY GIRL IN HER STROLLER.

20110118140527.000|20110118140528.000|CC1|FILLED WITH GASOLINE OVER THEM. 
20110118140528.000|20110118140530.000|CC1|THE CONTAINER CAUGHT FIRE.

20110118140545.000|20110118140545.000|CC1|CHARGES.

20110118140545.000|20110118140547.000|CC1|>>> THE TREES MAY BE GONE BUT

20110118140554.000|20110118140556.000|CC1|REMOVAL OF CENTURY-OLD OAKS AND

20110118140602.000|20110118140603.000|CC1|THE GROUP'S NEXT MOVE.          
20110118140603.000|20110118140604.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GOOD MORNING.      
20110118140604.000|20110118140606.000|CC1|THEY ARE PLANNING A NEWS CONFER 
20110118140606.000|20110118140609.000|CC1|THINS MORNING BEFORE THE BOARD  
20110118140609.000|20110118140610.000|CC1|OF SUPERVISORS MEETING,         
20110118140610.000|20110118140611.000|CC1|DEMANDING ANSWERS.              
20110118140611.000|20110118140612.000|CC1|THEY SAY THEY NEED AN           
20110118140612.000|20110118140614.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION TO MAKE SURE THIS 
20110118140614.000|20110118140615.000|CC1|DOESN'T HAPPEN AGAIN.           
20110118140615.000|20110118140615.000|CC1|IT'S ALL TAKING PLACE SIX DAYS  
20110118140615.000|20110118140618.000|CC1|AFTER THE GROUP FAILED TO STOP  
20110118140618.000|20110118140621.000|CC1|THE REMOVAL OF 179 OAK AND      
20110118140621.000|20110118140622.000|CC1|SYCAMORE TREES ALONG A WASH     
20110118140622.000|20110118140624.000|CC1|NEAR ELKINS IN ARCADIA.         
20110118140624.000|20110118140624.000|CC1|L.A.                            
20110118140624.000|20110118140626.000|CC1|COUNTY OFFICIALS SAY THEY NEED  
20110118140626.000|20110118140628.000|CC1|TO CLEAR THE 11 ACRES OF LAND   
20110118140628.000|20110118140631.000|CC1|FOR FLOOD CONTROL AND WATER     
20110118140631.000|20110118140632.000|CC1|CONSERVATION EFFORTS.           
20110118140632.000|20110118140633.000|CC1|SOME ENVIRONMENTALISTS          
20110118140633.000|20110118140634.000|CC1|DISAGREE, SAYING THE AREA COULD 
20110118140634.000|20110118140635.000|CC1|HAVE DEALT WITH THE MUD COMING  
20110118140635.000|20110118140636.000|CC1|FROM THE SANTA ANITA DAM.       
20110118140636.000|20110118140637.000|CC1|FOUR PEOPLE PLACED THEMSELVES   
20110118140637.000|20110118140640.000|CC1|IN THE TREES FOR HOURS BUT THEY 
20110118140640.000|20110118140642.000|CC1|WERE ALL EVENTUALLY REMOVED AND 
20110118140642.000|20110118140642.000|CC1|ARRESTED.                       
20110118140642.000|20110118140643.000|CC1|THE BOARD OF SUPERVISORS SAID   
20110118140643.000|20110118140645.000|CC1|IT WELCOMES THE INPUT OF THE    
20110118140645.000|20110118140647.000|CC1|COMMUNITY AND ANY KIND OF       
20110118140647.000|20110118140648.000|CC1|PROJECT AND SAID THIS           
20110118140648.000|20110118140649.000|CC1|PARTICULAR PUBLIC WORKS PROCESS 
20110118140649.000|20110118140651.000|CC1|TOOK THREE YEARS AND EVERYTHING 
20110118140651.000|20110118140654.000|CC1|WAS OPENED TO THE PUBLIC AND IT 
20110118140654.000|20110118140654.000|CC1|REMAINS OPEN.

20110118143647.000|20110118143648.000|CC1|>> I SAW IN ONE 20-MINUTE

20110118143712.000|20110118143713.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE BOARD OF

20110118143717.000|20110118143719.000|CC1|ANY KIND OF PROJECT AND SAYS    
20110118143719.000|20110118143720.000|CC1|THIS PUBLIC WORKS PROCESS TOOK  
20110118143720.000|20110118143722.000|CC1|THREE YEARS AND EVERYTHING WAS  
20110118143722.000|20110118143724.000|CC1|OPEN TO THE PUBLIC AND IT

20110118143746.000|20110118143746.000|CC1|HI, RICK.                       
20110118143746.000|20110118143748.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GOOD MORNING, JEAN

20110118143750.000|20110118143752.000|CC1|IN FRONT OF THE RESTAURANT,     
20110118143752.000|20110118143753.000|CC1|LUCKILY NOBODY THERE WAS

20110118143807.000|20110118143809.000|CC1|OF THE SIDEWALK.                
20110118143809.000|20110118143811.000|CC1|THIS HAPPENED AT THE CORNER OF  
20110118143811.000|20110118143813.000|CC1|WATERMAN AVENUE AND 13th STREET 
20110118143813.000|20110118143814.000|CC1|IN SAN BERNARDINO.              
20110118143814.000|20110118143817.000|CC1|AND IT LOOKED LIKE A MINI WAR   
20110118143817.000|20110118143818.000|CC1|ZONE IN THE IMMEDIATE           
20110118143818.000|20110118143819.000|CC1|AFTERMATH, CONCRETE AND         
20110118143819.000|20110118143822.000|CC1|ASPHALT, ALL KINDS OF DEBRIS    
20110118143822.000|20110118143825.000|CC1|SCATTERED EVERYWHERE AFTER A    
20110118143825.000|20110118143826.000|CC1|HIGH VOLTAGE UNDERGROUND        
20110118143826.000|20110118143826.000|CC1|TRANSFORMER EXPLODED.           
20110118143826.000|20110118143827.000|CC1|SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA EDISON      
20110118143827.000|20110118143828.000|CC1|CALLED IT AN EQUIPMENT FAILURE, 
20110118143828.000|20110118143830.000|CC1|THOSE WHO WERE HERE WHEN IT
